name: Ethereal Blade
description: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

abilities.name: Ether Blast
abilities.description: Blasts the target with an projectile that turns them ethereal, rendering them immune to physical damage and not attackable, but more vulnerable to magical damage, as well as disarming them.
notes: Turns the target ethereal, disarming them, rendering them attack immune, and granting 100% physical damage resistance
Magic resistance reduction of multiple ethereal sources does not stack, the one with higher value takes priority
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources
Reduces most heroes' magic resistance to -5%
With the magic resistance reduction from this source, every 10 points of intelligence further increases the total magic resistance by 1.4%
Ether Blast first applies the ethereal debuff, the damage, then the movement speed slow debuff
Checks the target's attributes upon projectile hit
If the target is an enemy, they also have their movement speed slowed, and take damage based on their primary attribute
If the target enemy is an universal hero, the damage is based on the sum of their attributes instead

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
96 mana, 0.4 mana regeneration and 0.8% flat base magic resistance
8 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
10.8 main attack damage to universal heroes
